sections.heading: Overview
content: Shana Johnson, MD , is a pain specialist who’s board-certified in physical medicine and rehabilitation. While caring for those living with health conditions that affect the brain, spine, and nerves, she's observed many who developed those issues while under unrelenting stress. They include chronic headaches, back pain, digestive issues, and other medical problems. She’s the author of Sunbreak: Healing the Pain No One Can Explain , which shines light on the stress-illness connection. Sunbreak explains the path to healing through understanding nerve sensitization, building your mind-body connection, and understanding the role of medical therapy.
